testcase.name: linksVerificationTest

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Response code for 'Basic Auth' [http://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth] is not 200. It is: 401 code with message: 'Unauthorized' expected [true] but found [false], Response code for 'Secure File Download' [http://the-internet.herokuapp.com/download_secure] is not 200. It is: 401 code with message: 'Unauthorized' expected [true] but found [false]
